amendment.description: Amendment increases EPA funding to clean up leaking underground storage tanks by $7.3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the funding (by transfer) for the leaking underground storage tank trust fund by $7.3 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mrs. Capps.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
